H0.text: Cytosol is also found inside all cells.

H1.text: Chloroplasm is also found inside all cells.

H2.text: Protein is also found inside all cells.

H3.text: Chromosomes are found inside the interior of all cells.

A4.text: The cytosol, also known as cytoplasmic matrix or groundplasm, is one of the liquids found inside cells (intracellular fluid (ICF)).

A5.text: In prokaryotes the cytosol contains the cell's genome, within a structure known as a nucleoid.

A6.text: It is present in most cells, with a few exceptions, for example, red blood cells.
